short.name: Miss Short (Depth – Front Rim)
diagnosis: Sequencing deficit → not generating leverage under the ball.

corrections.cue: Position body under the ball to generate leverage
corrections.biomech: Stacks mass under ball; improves vertical force.

anchor.name: Wide Stance Form Shots
anchor.instructions: Broaden stance, stack sternum over base, rise straight.

checklist: Sternum stacked over base on rise
Finish index to center of rim

long.name: Miss Long (Depth – Back Rim)
diagnosis: Finish issue → wrist not snapping fully.

corrections.cue: Snap wrist fully through the center of the rim
corrections.biomech: Restores distal segment contribution; adds controlled arc.

anchor.name: One-Hand Form Shots
anchor.instructions: Guide hand off; emphasize firm snap + soft land.

reinforcers.name: Guide Hand Slides
reinforcers.instructions: Slide off-hand away with no push at release.

left_right.name: Miss Left/Right (Side – Off-Line)
diagnosis: Shot path issue → misaligned release axis.

corrections.cue: Straight shot path through the side of the body
corrections.biomech: Keeps ball on sagittal plane; ball crosses center cleanly.

anchor.name: Side Backboard Form Shots
anchor.instructions: Use side square as lane; keep path straight through it.
